original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes. Those bushes grew up with the young plants. They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants.
korean_text: 더러는 가시떨기 속에 떨어지매 가시가 함께 자라서 기운을 막았고

sentences.original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 씨앗들이 가시 덤불 속에 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: Those bushes grew up with the young plants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 덤불들은 어린 싹들과 함께 자라났습니다.

sentences.original_text: They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 씨앗들이 튼튼한 식물로 자라는 것을 막았습니다.
